## Code Blocks

### Static Code Blocks

```python
print("Hello World!")
```

### Executable Python Code

[Docs](https://r-wasm.github.io/quarto-live/)

> Note the document format is set to `live-html` in the front matter.

```{pyodide}
#| autorun: true
for x in range(5):
    print(x ** 2)
```

### Executable R Code

[Docs](https://r-wasm.github.io/quarto-live/)

> Note the document format is set to `live-html` in the front matter.

```{webr}
for (x in 1:5) {
    print(x ** 2)
}
```
